body.title: Insert
body.elms:
| Shortcut | Description |
| ---      | ---         |
| `V`      | Vector      |
| `P`      | Pencil      |
| `T`      | Text        |
| `L`      | Line        |
| `R`      | Rectangle   |
| `O`      | Oval        |
| `U`      | Rounded     |
{: .-shortcuts}

body.title: Show
body.elms:
| Shortcut | Description            |
| ---      | ---                    |
| `^G`     | Show grid              |
| `^L`     | Show layout            |
| `^P`     | Show pixels            |
| `^H`     | Show selection handles |
| `^R`     | Show rulers            |
{: .-shortcuts}

body.title: Sidebars
body.elms:
| Shortcut | Description              |
| ---      | ---                      |
| `⌘⌥1`    | Toggle left (layers)     |
| `⌘⌥2`    | Toggle right (inspector) |
| `⌘⌥3`    | Toggle both              |
| `⌘.`     | Presentation mode        |
{: .-shortcuts}

body.title: Zoom
body.elms:
| Shortcut | Description             |
| ---      | ---                     |
| `⌘0`     | 100%                    |
| `⌘1`     | Fit to screen           |
| `⌘2`     | Fit selection to screen |
| `⌘3`     | Center selection        |
{: .-shortcuts}

body.title: Arrange
body.elms:
| Shortcut       | Description         |
| ---            | ---                 |
| `⌘⌥↑` _/_ `↓`  | Forward or backward |
| `^⌘⌥↑` _/_ `↓` | Front or back       |
{: .-shortcuts}

body.title: Layers
body.elms:
| Shortcut | Description  |
| ---      | ---          |
| `⌘R`     | Rename layer |
| `⌘F`     | Find layer   |
| `⌘G`     | Group        |
| `⌘⇧G`    | Ungroup      |
{: .-shortcuts}

body.title: Font
body.elms:
| Shortcut       | Description    |
| ---            | ---            |
| `⌘⌥ +` _/_ `-` | Bigger/smaller |
| `⌘⇧[`          | Left align     |
| `⌘⇧\`          | Center align   |
| `⌘⇧]`          | Right align    |
{: .-shortcuts}
